name: Blacksmith: Dark Times
description:
Take on the role of blacksmith in the castle, create weapons and sell it to soldiers, or the army of darkness will capture the last castle, which the darkness has not yet found
  ever closer.
- Early Access
- 6 types of weapons.
- Do not let the oven cool down.
- Buy ore, fuel, food supplies from the merchant.
- Mine ore yourself outside the castle walls
- Improve the furnace-buy parts and collect the boilers.
"If you hire a miner, it will bring you ore."
"Do not forget to sleep, eat, drink."
- Hero levels, and skills.
- Listen to the jokes of customers.
